message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
A decent offer, but I'm hoping for more. Your turn!
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I'm hoping for a better deal next time.
I'm trying to be more realistic about the value of money with each round. Hope you'll consider this offer!
I'm trying to make a stronger move. Your turn again!
You're pushing hard, Bob! I'm not giving in yet. I'll make a counteroffer.
I'm taking a risk, but I think this is my best shot. You're getting a lot, Bob, but I'm trying to survive!
I'm getting closer to my goal. Your turn again, Alice!
You're really pushing me to the limit, Bob! I'll try to make one more offer, but it's a long shot.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm giving you almost everything. Please accept!
